### swapBBContents() {#a96e05005577b2873e5ef9b3c99c4e30c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static void swapBBContents (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; BB1, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; BB2)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>

<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SelecLoopId = <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-loopinterchange-cpp-/loopinterchange/#af36ddc49228f8cf6ea22991daf2b26b0">selectLoopForInterchange</a>(LoopList);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Obtain the loop vector returned from loop cache analysis beforehand,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and put each &lt;Loop, index&gt; pair into a map for constant time query</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// later. Indices in loop vector reprsent the optimal order of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// corresponding loop, e.g., given a loopnest with depth N, index 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// indicates the loop should be placed as the outermost loop and index N</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// indicates the loop should be placed as the innermost loop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For the old pass manager CacheCost would be null.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;const Loop &#42;, unsigned&gt;</a> CostMap;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-loopinterchange-cpp-/loopinterchange/#a95eec28fcd78be0ea3050e6e779e6bb4">CC</a> != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;LoopCosts = <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-loopinterchange-cpp-/loopinterchange/#a95eec28fcd78be0ea3050e6e779e6bb4">CC</a>-&gt;getLoopCosts();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i &lt; LoopCosts.size(); i++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><Highlight kind="normal">        CostMap&#91;LoopCosts&#91;i&#93;.first&#93; = i;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We try to achieve the globally optimal memory access for the loopnest,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and do interchange based on a bubble-sort fasion. We start from</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the innermost loop, move it outwards to the best possible position</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and repeat this process.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> j = SelecLoopId; j &gt; 0; j--) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ChangedPerIter = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = SelecLoopId; i &gt; SelecLoopId - j; i--) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Interchanged = <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-loopinterchange-cpp-/loopinterchange/#a5342eefdd06826f163b13f40992ce8e4">processLoop</a>(LoopList&#91;i&#93;, LoopList&#91;i - 1&#93;, i, i - 1,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><Highlight kind="normal">                                        DependencyMatrix, CostMap);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Interchanged)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Loops interchanged, update LoopList accordingly.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std/#ab8424022895aee3e366fb9a32f2883cb">std::swap</a>(LoopList&#91;i - 1&#93;, LoopList&#91;i&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Update the DependencyMatrix</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="#a6fdefa5e30cfe78c973990812d4a8900">interChangeDependencies</a>(DependencyMatrix, i, i - 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Dependency matrix after interchange:\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><Highlight kind="normal">        ChangedPerIter |= Interchanged;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Early abort if there was no interchange during an entire round of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// moving loops outwards.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!ChangedPerIter)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;OuterLoopLatch = OuterLoop-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#a1230fd674d2609b96527fe65eaf40b1b">getLoopLatch</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Checking if loops are tightly nested\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A perfectly nested loop will not have any branch in between the outer and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// inner block i.e. outer header will branch to either inner preheader and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// outerloop latch.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="908"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We currently support LCSSA PHI nodes in the outer loop exit, if their</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// incoming values do not come from the outer loop latch or if the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// outer loop latch has a single predecessor. In that case, the value will</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// be available if both the inner and outer loop conditions are true, which</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// will still be true after interchanging. If we have multiple predecessor,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that may not be the case, e.g. because the outer loop latch may be executed</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="914"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// if the inner loop is not executed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="915" lineLink="#a6080253e27bfa816dce219371e6a820c"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a6080253e27bfa816dce219371e6a820c">areOuterLoopExitPHIsSupported</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;OuterLoop, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;InnerLoop) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;LoopNestExit = OuterLoop-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#afd50c2de451ac9fc0865dc747dd2d485">getUniqueExitBlock</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="917"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpurewriteundefforphi-cpp/#a2e83cb1bc3f5e8986cbd14575755a134">PHI</a> : LoopNestExit-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a13da92d2694197fbcb5b95fd94e7570d">phis</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="918"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i &lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpurewriteundefforphi-cpp/#a2e83cb1bc3f5e8986cbd14575755a134">PHI</a>.getNumIncomingValues(); i++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="919"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;IncomingI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpurewriteundefforphi-cpp/#a2e83cb1bc3f5e8986cbd14575755a134">PHI</a>.getIncomingValue(i));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="920"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!IncomingI || IncomingI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>() != OuterLoop-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#a1230fd674d2609b96527fe65eaf40b1b">getLoopLatch</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="921"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="922"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="923"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The incoming value is defined in the outer loop latch. Currently we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="924"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// only support that in case the outer loop latch has a single predecessor.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="925"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This guarantees that the outer loop latch is executed if and only if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="926"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the inner loop is executed (because tightlyNested() guarantees that the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="927"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// outer loop header only branches to the inner loop or the outer loop</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="928"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// latch).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="929"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: We could weaken this logic and allow multiple predecessors,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="930"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        if the values are produced outside the loop latch. We would need</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="931"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        additional logic to update the PHI nodes in the exit block as</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="932"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        well.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="933"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (OuterLoop-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopbase/#a1230fd674d2609b96527fe65eaf40b1b">getLoopLatch</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a74aa9daea070e2ad3394a3ec58b7316a">getUniquePredecessor</a>() == </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="934"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="939"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="940"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In case of multi-level nested loops, it may occur that lcssa phis exist in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="942"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// inside the loopnest. Sometimes those incoming values are not available</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1081"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i &lt; NumOp; ++i) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1082"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Skip operands that are not SCEV-able.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1087"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevaddrecexpr">SCEVAddRecExpr</a> &#42;AR = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;SCEVAddRecExpr&gt;</a>(OperandVal);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1088"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!AR)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1090"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1091"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we find the inner induction after an outer induction e.g.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1092"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// for(int i=0;i&lt;N;i++)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1093"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   for(int j=0;j&lt;N;j++)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1094"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     A&#91;i&#93;&#91;j&#93; = A&#91;i-1&#93;&#91;j-1&#93;+k;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1095"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// then it is a good order.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1096"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (AR-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevaddrecexpr/#a99ab4a82c6d7373e2e367986b9527bf0">getLoop</a>() == InnerLoop) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1097"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We found an InnerLoop induction after OuterLoop induction. It is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1098"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a good order.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1099"><Highlight kind="normal">            FoundInnerInduction = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1100"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (FoundOuterInduction) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1101"><Highlight kind="normal">              GoodOrder++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1102"><Highlight kind="normal">              </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1103"><Highlight kind="normal">            &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1104"><Highlight kind="normal">          &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1105"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we find the outer induction after an inner induction e.g.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1106"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// for(int i=0;i&lt;N;i++)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1107"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   for(int j=0;j&lt;N;j++)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1108"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     A&#91;j&#93;&#91;i&#93; = A&#91;j-1&#93;&#91;i-1&#93;+k;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1109"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// then it is a bad order.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1110"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (AR-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevaddrecexpr/#a99ab4a82c6d7373e2e367986b9527bf0">getLoop</a>() == OuterLoop) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1111"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We found an OuterLoop induction after InnerLoop induction. It is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1112"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a bad order.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1113"><Highlight kind="normal">            FoundOuterInduction = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1114"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (FoundInnerInduction) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1115"><Highlight kind="normal">              BadOrder++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1116"><Highlight kind="normal">              </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1117"><Highlight kind="normal">            &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1118"><Highlight kind="normal">          &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1119"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1121"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1122"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1123"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> GoodOrder - BadOrder;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1126"><Highlight kind="normal">std::optional&lt;bool&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1127"><Highlight kind="normal">LoopInterchangeProfitability::isProfitablePerLoopCacheAnalysis(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1128"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;const Loop &#42;, unsigned&gt;</a> &amp;CostMap,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1129"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;CacheCost&gt; &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/riscv/riscvredundantcopyelimination-cpp/#a77c69067ae8279bc00ab8757731e90d7">CC</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1130"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is the new cost model returned from loop cache analysis.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1131"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A smaller index means the loop should be placed an outer loop, and vice</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1132"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// versa.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1133"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CostMap.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a836d9cba6deced0bb1fa7333ce5afd3a">contains</a>(InnerLoop) &amp;&amp; CostMap.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a836d9cba6deced0bb1fa7333ce5afd3a">contains</a>(OuterLoop)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1134"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> InnerIndex = 0, OuterIndex = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1236"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1237"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Update LoopInfo, after interchanging. NewInner and NewOuter refer to the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1238"><Highlight kind="comment">/// new inner and outer loop after interchanging: NewInner is the original</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1239"><Highlight kind="comment">/// outer loop and NewOuter is the original inner loop.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1240"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1241"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Before interchanging, we have the following structure</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1242"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Outer preheader</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1243"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  Outer header</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1244"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    Inner preheader</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1245"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    Inner header</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1246"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      Inner body</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1247"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      Inner latch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1248"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   outer bbs</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1249"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   Outer latch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1250"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1251"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// After interchanging:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1252"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Inner preheader</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1253"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Inner header</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1254"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   Outer preheader</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1255"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   Outer header</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1256"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     Inner body</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1257"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     outer bbs</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1482"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// defined either in the header or latch. Those blocks will become header and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1483"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// latch of the new outer loop, and the only possible users can PHI nodes</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1484"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// in the exit block of the loop nest or the outer loop header (reduction</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1485"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// PHIs, in that case, the incoming value must be defined in the inner loop</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1487"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the PHI.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
